com.algolia.instantsearch.model

Interface AlgoliaResultsListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AlgoliaWidget
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Hits, RefinementList, Stats

    public interface AlgoliaResultsListener
    The AlgoliaResultsListener interface lets you define a component that will react to search results or errors.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(com.algolia.search.saas.Query query, com.algolia.search.saas.AlgoliaException error)
      Event listener to react to potential search errors.
      void onResults(SearchResults results, boolean isLoadingMore)
      Event listener to react to new hits.

    • Method Detail

      • onResults

        void onResults(SearchResults results,
               boolean isLoadingMore)
        Event listener to react to new hits.
        Parameters:
        results - a SearchResults object containing hits.
        isLoadingMore - true if these hits come from the same query than the previous ones.

      • onError

        void onError(com.algolia.search.saas.Query query,
             com.algolia.search.saas.AlgoliaException error)
        Event listener to react to potential search errors.
        Parameters:
        query - the Query that was used.
        error - the resulting AlgoliaException.
